summary:
Interested in a passionate, experienced and engaged professional/manager who is making a difference? Welcome to my LinkedIn profile.

Brian

Brian van Daal
E: brianvandaal@gmail.com
T: +31629213081

I am....

An experienced and customer focussed IT and Change/Transformation manager. Ability to manage large teams and departments (with different nationalities and cultures). I'm combining a pragmatic result driven approach with a people-oriented style. Successful in leading departments through a transition (start up or reorganisation) whilst delivering the expected services. I've an international mindset and am experienced in managing cq working together with vendors in an international setting.

STRENGTHS 

* Change/Transformation management 
* Offshoring
* Managing teams / ICT departments
* Execution
* Teamplayer 
* Result driven
* People Manager
* Building coalitions
* Business - IT Alignment
* Digital Product Management
* Agile Transformation

For more information and details please have a look at my CV:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx6yWcYT9O_4M1REcVQ1NW1oSWM/view?usp=sharing

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for the delivery of projects from LeasePlan’s Next Generation Digital Architecture domains into LeasePlan’s Front Runners countries.
- Responsible for aligning the LeasePlan digital roadmap and projects with the LeasePlan Netherlands roadmaps and project portfolio.

LeasePlan is building a digital presence to create the “future of digital” in the mobility industry, and to achieve LeasePlan’s vision of “any car, anywhere, anytime”.
profile_positions.title: Head of Program Management | Sr Program Manager Digital Transformation

profile_positions.description: Executive Director at AlphaBet Club (ABC): International not-for-profit organization helping children in need to break the cycle of poverty through education. ABC funds local schools, education and nutrition programs for many children living in slums. Operating in the Netherlands (HQ), Spain, India and the United States. ABC is funded by donations, sponsorships and proceeds from fundraising events. Responsible for fundraising, finance, volunteer engagement, due diligence/evaluation of charity projects and partners.
profile_positions.title: Board of Directors

profile_positions.description:
- Tribe Lead & Chief Product Owner / Digital Product manager of the international customer portal MyAthlon
- Successfully implementing Scaled Agile working at Athlon International
- Responsible for creating the new digital organization that will enable Athlon Netherlands to support the B2B customers and a new proposition for its private lease for consumers (B2C) and small and medium businesses (SMB). This new organization will be built largely greenfield, both from a technological and organizational perspective.
- Responsible for the Strategic program Lighthouse Digital Transformation of Athlon International

Athlon is an international provider of Operational Car Leasing and Mobility Solutions, active in 11 European countries and develops innovative, sustainable and cost-efficient mobility solutions. Athlon is part of Daimler.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member Board of Directors AlphaBet Club Charity Foundation
volunteer_experiences.description: The AlphaBet Club is an international not-for-profit organization helping children in need to break the cycle of poverty through education. ABC funds local schools (12 to date - in India, Nepal, Haiti, Laos and Cambodia), education and nutrition (250,000+ free meals served) programs that would otherwise be out of reach for many children living in slums. Operating in the Netherlands, Spain, India and the United States; ABC is funded by donations, sponsorships and proceeds from fundraising events. More info at: http://www.AlphaBetClub.org
